sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ButtonA } from '../ButtonElements'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, InfoH1, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, ImgLogo } from './infoElements'; const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, lightText, darkText, description, buttonlabel, img, alt }) => { const [hover, setHover] = useState(false) const onHover = () => { setHover(!hover); }; return ( <> Portfolio {description} {buttonlabel} ) } export default InfoSection
